from django import forms
from .models import CustomUser  # Import your CustomUser model from models.py
from .models import Poll



[docs]
class CustomUserCreationForm(forms.ModelForm):
    password1 = forms.CharField(label='Password', widget=forms.PasswordInput)
    password2 = forms.CharField(label='Confirm Password', widget=forms.PasswordInput)



[docs]
    class Meta:
        model = CustomUser
        fields = ('username', 'email', 'first_name', 'last_name')





[docs]
    def clean_password2(self):
        # Check that the two password entries match
        password1 = self.cleaned_data.get('password1')
        password2 = self.cleaned_data.get('password2')
        if password1 and password2 and password1 != password2:
            raise forms.ValidationError("Passwords do not match.")
        return password2





[docs]
    def save(self, commit=True):
        # Save the user object with a hashed password
        user = super().save(commit=False)
        user.set_password(self.cleaned_data["password1"])
        if commit:
            user.save()
        return user




    


[docs]
class PollForm(forms.ModelForm):


[docs]
    class Meta:
        model = Poll
        fields = ['favorite_song', 'favorite_album']
        widgets = {
            'favorite_song': forms.RadioSelect(),
            'favorite_album': forms.RadioSelect(),
        }
